required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Long-term Safety and Effectiveness of Growtropin速-II Treatment in Children With Short Stature
clinical_study.official_title: Open, Multi-center, Non-interventional, Prospective/ Retrospective Observational Study on Long-term Safety and Effectiveness of Growtropin速-II Treatment in Children With Short Stature

brief_summary.textblock: This study evaluates long-term safety and effectiveness of Growtropin速-II treatment in children with short stature.

primary_outcome.measure: Long term safety assessed through the adverse events
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 2 years after epiphyseal closure
primary_outcome.description: Number of occurrence of treatment-related adverse events

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 2 years after epiphyseal closure
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the difference in change of annualized height velocity between baseline and every 6 months

secondary_outcome.measure: The difference between target height and final height
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 2 years after epiphyseal closure
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the difference in target height and final height

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 2 years after epiphyseal closure
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the changes in Height SDS between baseline and every 6 months

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 2 years after epiphyseal closure
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the changes in skeletal maturity between baseline and every 6 months

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 2 years after epiphyseal closure
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the changes in IGF-1 between baseline and every 6 months

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 2 years after epiphyseal closure
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the changes in IGFBP-3 between baseline and every 6 months

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 2 years after epiphyseal closure
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the changes in BMI SDS between baseline and every 6 months

study_pop.textblock: Short stature by GHD or ISS or TS or SGA

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Children with short stature by growth hormone deficiency(GHD) or idiopathic short stature (ISS) or turner's syndrome(TS) or small for gestational age(SGA)
- Children who has official height record at least 6 months prior
Exclusion Criteria:
- Children with Epiphyseal closure

facility.name: Yonsei University Health System, Severance Hospital
